short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows a user to register a data source with IGC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows a user to register a data source with IGC.

Requires a valid W3 ID and connection to the intranet.

After installation, set your display name and email address in the extension preferences. Use ONLY your IBM address OR your TWC address.

For more detailed installation instructions and general usage guidelines, visit the following link. 

https://apps.na.collabserv.com/wikis/home?lang=en-us#!/wiki/W487173b1fd64_489c_8165_c28684edfb8e/page/Browser%20Extensions%20for%20Registering%20Interesting%20Data
